import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import useMarvelService from '../../services/useMarvelService' import Spinner from '../Spinner/Spinner'; import './charList.scss'; import abyss from '../../resources/img/abyss.jpg'; const CharList = () => { const [charList, setCharList] = useState([]) const {loading, getAllCharacters} = useMarvelService() useEffect(() => { onCharList() }, []) const onCharList = () => { getAllCharacters().then(res => setCharList([...charList, res])) } const characters = charList.map return (
  • Abyss
  • Abyss

) } export default CharList;
